executiveSummary: Entrepreneurs Zach and Steven pitched their company, RigStrips, seeking $300,000 for a 7.5% stake to expand their magnetic and adhesive protective strips for skis, snowboards, and fishing rods. After discussing product design, sales, and profitability, Todd Graves offered $300,000 for 20%, negotiated down to 15%, which the entrepreneurs accepted.
keyDecisions: Todd Graves invested $300,000 in RigStrips for a 15% equity stake.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement with Todd Graves for $300,000 at 15% equity.
Expand marketing strategies beyond Meta ads to other direct online channels.
Increase product inventory to meet projected $2.7 million in sales for the year.

nextSteps: Zach and Steven will collaborate with Todd Graves and his marketing team to scale RigStripsâ€™ brand awareness and production capacity while executing on expanded marketing initiatives.
